How do you take screenshots of a bootable iso? / windows xp setup.
You can take a screenshot of your release by loading your *.iso image in to a virtual machine. For example Virtual Machine or VMWare. Then you can show your leechers what you're exactly releasing.

robinonley, is it ok now - bootable ???

After copying the files in the .iso to a new folder, copying the Setup file from my personal windows XP disc into the file, and then rebuilding the folder into a new bootable .iso with nLite, the install works perfectly. If anyone's having issues with it not working, try that. Also, love the background during installation, far more entertaining than the regular XP install background :D
